org.objectstyle.cayenne
Class Fault

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.Fault
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class Fault
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents a placeholder for an unresolved relationship from a source object. Fault is resolved via resolveFault(DataObject,String). Depending on the type of fault it is resolved differently. Each type of fault is a singleton that can be obtained via corresponding static method.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Andrei Adamchik
See Also:
Serialized Form
